branchCategory.name: AK
branchCategory.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities. Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">® </span>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.

branchItem.name: AK10PA, Pneumatic Actuation Pressure Regulator, Low Flow
branchItem.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities. Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">® </span>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Actuation control pressure isolated from process gas by two seals <LI>Body material: 316 SS <LI>High inlet pressure type: Standard Max. 3500 psig (24.1 MPa) <LI>Flow capacity: Standard to 30 slpm; HF (Option) to 120 slpm <LI>Ni-Cr-Mo alloy internals available for corrosion resistance <LI>100 psig (0.69 MPa) outlet pressure achievable with 80 psig (0.55 MPa) control pressure or less</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: AK15PA, Pneumatic Actuation Pressure Regulator, Low Flow (Tied-diaphragm)
branchItem.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities. Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">® </span>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Actuation control pressure isolated from process gas by two seals <LI>Body material: 316 SS <LI>High inlet pressure type: Standard Max. 3500 psig (24.1 MPa) <LI>Flow capacity: Standard to 30 slpm <LI>Ni-Cr-Mo alloy internals available for corrosion resistance <LI>100 psig (0.69 MPa) outlet pressure achievable with 80 psig (0.55 MPa) control pressure or less</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: AK14PAT, Pneumatic Actuation Pressure Regulator, Intermediate Flow (Tied-diaphragm)
branchItem.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities. Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">® </span>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Actuation control pressure isolated from process gas by two seals <LI>Body material: 316 SS <LI>High inlet pressure type: Standard Max. 2300 psig (15.9 MPa); HR (Option): Max. 3000 psig (20.7 MPa) <LI>Flow capacity: Standard to 400 slpm <LI>Ni-Cr-Mo alloy internals <LI>100 psig (0.69 MPa) outlet pressure achievable with 80 psig (0.55 MPa) control pressure or less</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: AK12PA, Pneumatic Actuation Pressure Regulator, High Flow (Tied-diaphragm)
branchItem.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities. Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">® </span>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Actuation control pressure isolated from process gas by two seals <LI>Body material: 316 SS <LI>High inlet pressure type: Standard Max. 1700 psig (11.7 MPa) <LI>Flow capacity: Standard to 800 slpm; HF (Option) to 1000 slpm <LI>Ni-Cr-Mo alloy internals available for corrosion resistance <LI>100 psig (0.69 MPa) outlet pressure achievable with 80 psig (0.55 MPa) control pressure or less</LI></UL>
